abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of this restructuring is
            to refocus the scope of the Financial System Infrastructure
            Modernization Project, given the decision of the Bank of
            Algeria to fund the information systems component, with its
            own resources. This refocus is linked to a reduction of the
            loan amount to reflect this change, and cost savings that
            occurred due to technological improvements under the other
            components (the Real Time Gross Settlement System -RTGS -
            and the telecommunications components). The Algerian
            authorities have also requested an extension of the project
            closing date to allow them fulfill the project's
            development objectives. It is important to note that the
            statements and policies of the Government and of the Bank of
            Algeria in support of global payments systems reform, proves
            (and ensures) the commitment to see the project objectives
            achieved, and to further engage in additional payments
            systems reform which would help strengthen the financial
            infrastructure, and would support the sector's role in
            economic and private sector growth. The restructuring
            satisfactorily complies with the Articles of Agreement of
            the Association and the Bank, and it is recommended that
            project restructuring be approved.
